verses.text: \w I|strong="H1961"\w* cry aloud \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H1961"\w* lift \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H8605"\w* mercy.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* pour \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* complaint before \w Him|strong="H6963"\w*; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* reveal \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H6963"\w*.

Although \w my|strong="H8210"\w* spirit grows faint \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w know|strong="H5046"\w* \w my|strong="H8210"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Along|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* path \w I|strong="H6869"\w* travel \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H6869"\w* hidden \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Look \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w*; \w no|strong="H3045"\w* one attends \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w There|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w no|strong="H3045"\w* refuge \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w no|strong="H3045"\w* one cares \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul.

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* cry \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w You|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w You|strong="H4480"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w*, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w portion|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w*.”

Listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* quite low. Rescue \w me|strong="H2416"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* pursuers, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* too strong \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2416"\w*.

Free \w my|strong="H5337"\w* soul \w from|strong="H4480"\w* prison, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* name. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H3588"\w* gather around \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* goodness \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.
